name: G.R.A.V.E
description:
Welcome to the Geostationary Research center on Anomaly in Various Environment (G.R.A.V.E) were you will solve problem by using artificial black hole

This prototype has been realise during the Godot Wild Jam #8

Known issue :

- The cube will behave strangely after releasing it and can be clip through wall while being pickup in case you loose it press T to restart the level

- You can some time being stuck while traversing a black hole if it's place verticaly to low ( press T to restart the level)
